data.md:MetaData: Age determination of sediment core TRIFOGLI, Lago Trifoglietti, Italy
Lake. Physiography: mountain. Surrounding vegetation: forest. Local vegetation: Carex paniculata tussocks. Location: in the lake. Device diameter: 8 cm.
Lateglacial-Holocene abrupt vegetation changes at Lago Trifoglietti in Calabria, Southern Italy: The setting of ecosystems in a refugial zone
